library.topic: Home workout library for strength beginners
library.title: Beginner Strength Training Library
library.description: A practical library of safe items and equipment for strength training at home.
library.notes: Keep it safe and realistic. Avoid medical claims. No drug or steroid advice.

blueprints.title: 3-Day Strength Split (Beginner)
blueprints.description: A simple routine you can repeat weekly.
blueprints.notes: Use basic bodyweight and minimal equipment.
